text:

Our interactions were not frequent but memorable ones.

Wish u lots of luck and success ahead in future.

text:

Tune placement k time bhut help ki meri. I can never forget phone pe hi pdha rha tha. HR wale questions bhi tere se hi chaape the kuch kuch portion. Bhut shi guidance diya. 
Bhai bs aise hi bne rehna. Wish u succeed manifolds.
Take care

text: Bhai bihari tere kya kehne, udghosh mnp se lecture halls aur wing m time pass. Wo pubg ki class to yaad hi hogi (ESO208) ğŸ¤£ tere aur Ashutosh k saath. Saare profs aur batchmates ki inside news discuss Krna. Aisa koi shayad hi hoga apne Y17 CHE dept m jise humne baith k galiyaya na ho. Trust me those moments are irreplaceable. Had it not be you or Ashutosh che classes would have felt boring. Sbse epic mujhe fluid ka end sem lga tha jb ek dusre ki muh ki taraf dekh rhe the. Bhai manna pdega tu kitna bda panauti h kitne match harwaye h tune teamon ko ipl mğŸ¤£ No one can even come close to your record. Wo summers bhi kya time tha jb mai tere aur Mohit k room pe hi pda rhta tha. Tujhe wo to yaad hi hoga jb hmne Devashish ko protein becha tha aur movie dekhne gye the tu , mai aur Mohit. Mja hi aa gya tha yaar. Yar ye faltu m corona ne apna last year chheen liya wrna aur bhi kaafi memories bnti. Bhai wo ek club bnana tha couples data k liye, wo adhura rah gya hmara planğŸ¤£ Wish ye college days thoda aur chlte rehte . Good to see our mini group in che getting placed. As I end writing this, I still feel if I am missing something. Looking forward to meeting you soon bhai

Aur bhai Head Web Udghosh. Pankaj mujhe tujhse baat krne k liye bolte the jb bhi site m kuch dikkat hoti thi. Aur tu ulta humein hi smjha deta tha aur core team ki hi gltiyan nikal deta thağŸ¤£
Bda hi shi attitude h tera, har chhez ko casually lete hue bhi shi execute kr deta h, wo baat alag h thoda late hi shiğŸ˜œ

text:
Bhai chemical m aisa koi bnda ni hoga jiske tumne mje na liye ho. Ha 208 m tere saath bda shi time pass hota tha, bs dar lgta tha kahi tutor bahar ka rasta na dikha değŸ˜œ
Yaad h 352 ka , mass ki class m peeche baith k dara rha tu mje, but kuch ho hi na skta tha uss time yar group wale hi ajeeb nikleğŸ¤£
Short memorable interactions h tere saath.
